text:
The Purge is an American horror franchise consisting of four films: The Purge (2013), The Purge: Anarchy (2014), The Purge: Election Year (2016) and The First Purge (2018), and a television series, also bearing the name The Purge. The films are based on a future dystopic America, where every year there is a 12-hour period during which all crime, including murder, is legal. The concept was created by James DeMonaco, who also directed the first three films, wrote all the movies, and has written the first episode of the television series so far.
The Purge series has received a generally mixed critical reception, and has grossed over $447 million in the worldwide box office against a combined budget of $35 million.
